verbose_text: In nociceptors, Ano1 is specifically activated by local Ca 2+ signals mediated by TRPV1 and inflammatory mediators like serotonin or bradykinin via G protein coupled receptors (GPCRs) activating the IP 3 -receptor cascade (see XREF_FIG).
evidence: mediated by TRPV1 and inflammatory mediators like serotonin or bradykinin via G-protein
